titles.title: A resolution commending the Virginia Retail Merchants Association on 100 years of service to the community.
A resolution commending the Virginia Retail Merchants Association on 100 years of service to the community.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Congratulates the Virginia Retail Merchants Association on its 100th anniversary.
Recognizes its years of service to the retail community.
